name: 黃孟帆
objective:
世界經濟論壇 2025 年《就業未來報告》指出，AI 的趨勢正改變就業市場並加速轉型。人工智慧 (AI) 作為一種能表現智慧的技術，已深刻改變了人類與科技產品的互動方式。隨著科技的日新月異，AI 從基本的數據運算逐步發展為具備創造力的工具，其中「生成式人工智慧」(Generative AI) 尤為矚目。 本課程旨在培養學生對圖像生成式 AI 的素養與實務應用。透過多種 AI 繪圖工具的學習與應用，引導學生創作出具視覺吸引力的作品，並幫助設計流程的發展。同時，課程將提供最新的趨勢資訊與實作教學，讓學生能完成具體的創意項目與設計專案。
The World Economic Forum's 2025 "Future of Jobs Report" indicates that the trend of AI is transforming the job market and accelerating its evolution. Artificial Intelligence (AI), as a technology capable of exhibiting intelligence, has profoundly changed the way humans interact with technological products. With the rapid advancement of technology, AI has evolved from basic data computation to a tool with creative capabilities, with "Generative AI" being particularly noteworthy. This course aims to cultivate students' literacy and practical application of image-generative AI. Through the learning and application of various AI drawing tools, students will be guided to create visually appealing works and assist in the development of design processes. Additionally, the course will provide the latest trend information and practical teaching, enabling students to complete specific creative projects and design assignments.

課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）● 深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
